channel.title: How do you make a portal teleport you

item.title: How do you make a portal teleport you
item.dc:creator: @erko321 erko321
item.description:
@erko321 wrote:

ok thanks for telling me ive tryed codes like that and many many differents ones and its just not working for me im using same code as i used to make the object 2469 is a zamorak portal i have spawned another portal to 2467 for id that doesnt work either im using source devolution 7.0 dadian’s source the source didnt have any portals or extra added things ive been working with it for awhile and ive just goten to my portal part im not much of a noob at coding in java this the first problem i havent been able to figure out but this isnt working for me

and what do you mean right portal is there a specific portal id i must use for teleporting? im using 2469 and 2467
if those ar not a good id please tell me right one

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a portal teleport you

item.title: How do you make a portal teleport you
item.dc:creator: @Maxie35 Maxie35
item.description:
@Maxie35 wrote:

The case number is the ID of the portal, are u using the right portal??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 04, 2008, 02:01:04 AM[/size][hr]BTW, Ill straight away say how u will do it right…

In Client.Java search for:

//Portals

Or something like that, so u are in the portal list, then in there just add this:

case Portal ID: // Portal teleportToX = xCoord; teleportToY = yCoord; sendMessage("Put in Message here, leave blank or delete if u dont want a message."); break;

Read full topic

item.description:
@erko321 wrote:

befor you all flame me for not searching i have all day ive tryed many tuts i dont get errors but the portal just wont teleport me i have it made i have the right case idk why this doesnt work my code for the case is

case 2469: //Portal { teleportToX = 2661; teleportToY = 3307; } break;
ive tryed many codes but i just made it down to a simple one someone post how to fix this problem and just not to flame
